FirstStepP.1: Revisa los datos y completa aquellos pendientes antes de continuar con el proceso.

SndStepP1.1: Once the payment of the product has been made, you will receive an email with the details of the purchase.

SndStepP2.1: You will be redirected to a payment platform. It is a safe process. It may take 24 hours for payment validation to complete.
